Actors: Antonella Attili, Enzo Cannavale, Isa Danieli, Leo Gullotta
Writer: Giuseppe Tornatore (story), Giuseppe Tornatore (screenplay), Vanna Paoli (collaborating writer), Richard Epcar (english version)
Title: Cinema Paradiso
Plot: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.
